issue.title: Need a way to join a thread with a timeout

discussion.p: There is no way to join a thread with a timeout.

blockquote.p: Add join_for and join_until. Or decide one should never join a thread with a timeout since pthread_join doesn't have a timeout version.

discussion.p: The concurrency working group deemed this an extension beyond the scope of C++0x.

rationale.p: The LWG does not wish to make a change at this time.
